remark.ch: 先修:線性系統或數位控制

goal.en: Students can program time domain and frequency domain algorithms for system model identification algorithm
goal.ch: 學生能夠將時域以及頻域的演算法撰寫成程式進行系統鑑模

content.en:
1. State space model of mass-spring-vibration system
2. Convertes Continuous time state space into discrete time state space model
3. Numerical simulation of mass-spring-damping system and construction of Markov parameters.
4. Establish the observer state space model and the observer Markov parameters from the state space model。
5. Convert the state space model to a linear difference equation model.
6. Numerical simulation of sine wave sweep to create Bode diagram
7. Direct calculation of sequence correlation and indirect calculation of sequence correlation by FFT, Sequences Modulation and IFFT.。
8. Frequency domain system identification: calculate the FRF using DTFT.
9. Recursive Least Square Estimation Algorithm.
content.ch:
1. 質量-彈簧-阻尼系統狀態空間模型建立。
2. 連續時間狀態空間轉換為離散時間狀態空間。
3. 質量-彈簧-阻尼系統數值動態模擬及馬可夫參數建構。
4. 由狀態空間模型建立觀測器狀態空間模型以及觀測器馬可夫參數。
5. 狀態空間模型轉換為線性差分方程模型。
6. 數值模擬弦波掃瞄建立鮑得圖。
7. 直接計算數列關聯性及間接以FFT，數列調變及IFFT間接計算數列關聯性。
8. 頻域系統鑑模:以離散時間富利葉轉換DTFT計算頻率響應函數FRF。
9. 疊代式最小方差演算法。

textbook.en: Book : System Identification lecture note by Dr. SB Jiang. Referance: Applied System Identification by Dr. JN Juang
textbook.ch: 教科書 : 課程講義 江士標博士著 參考書 : 應用系統鑑別 莊哲男 博士著

office_hr.ch: 星期二 下午 1 點

flex_desc.en: Lectures are completed in 16 weeks. If there are too many holidays, they will be postponed. If there are no holidays, the last two weeks will be used for students to complete programming homework.
flex_desc.ch: 16週完成講課，若放假日過多則延後補上，若無則最後兩週供學生完成程式作業。

en.competency: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation

en: Department:Master Program in Opto-Mechatronics Engineering, Department of Mechanical Engineering、MSc in Opto-Mechatronics Engineering only.
ch: 系所:限機械工程學系光機電工程碩士班、機械工程學系光機電工程博士班。
